attributes.action: allow volunteers to carry out non nursing duties in hospitals.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Nursing hospitals staff, should be allowed to nurse patients and not be involved in non nursing duties i.e. directing  patients and their records to holding areas, prior to seeing a doctor.

Volunteer workers should be involved in non nursing duties and only expect to receive travel allowances, from and to their home by way of a voucher, cashable at a supermarket food store.
